title: HAP 57 - Race First, Then Party - T. Thomas Fortune
itunes:title: HAP 57 - Race First, Then Party - T. Thomas Fortune
description: T. Thomas Fortune uses newspaper editorials to put forth a theory of civil rights and set out a plan of political action for protecting them.
